full_summary:
# Mobile Gear Sentinel Fisheries in Northern NAFO Divisions 4S and 4T

## General Information

* **Supplier Title / Title du fabricant** : Mobile Gear Sentinel Fisheries in NAFO Divisions 4S and 4T (Northern Part)
* **Contract Title / Titre du contrat** : Pêches sentinelles par engins mobiles dans les divisions 4S et 4T (Partie Nord) de l’OPANO
* **Reference No** : cb-5580-87319123
* **Revision No / Version du document** : 3
* **Notice No. / NO de consultation publique** : 30004219
* **Publication Date / Date de publication** : 2023-05-17
* **Closing Date / Date limite** : 2023-06-01T13:00:00
* **Revision Date / Date de modification** : 2023-06-01
* **Contract start & end date / Date de début de contrat et date de fin** : 2023-06-06 to 2024-06-30

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category / Catégorie d'approvisionnement** : Supply (SRV)
* **Procurement Method / Méthode d'approvisionnement** : Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Method of procurement / Méthode de poursuite** : Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) has issued a call for expressions of interest to conduct a bottom trawl survey as part of the Mobile Gear Sentinel Fisheries Program. The collected data will be used for the development of a fishery-independent abundance index, to inform adjustments in allowable catches for northern Gulf cod, Atlantic halibut, redfish and Greenland halibut. 

## Sourcing

* **Tenders available from / Sites d'appel d'offres ouverts** : Canada.ca
* **Attachment / Pièce jointe** : 30004219---acan.pdf, 30002419---addendum-1.pdf

Note that this notice has expired. However, for future reference, this detail was:
* **Notice Type / Type d'avis** : Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Trade Agreement / Accord commercial** : Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region / Région** : Canada
